patthana23.53:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.53:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.53:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
